ISO 123:2001
p
ISO 123:2001
23281

ISO 123:2001

Rubber latex

Sampling

Status : Published (Under review)

This standard was last reviewed and confirmed in 2021. Therefore this version remains current.
en
Format Language
std 1 63 PDF
std 2 63 Paper
  • CHF63
Convert Swiss francs (CHF) to your currency

Abstract

This International Standard specifies procedures for sampling natural rubber latex concentrate and for sampling synthetic

rubber latices and artificial latices. It is also suitable for sampling rubber latex contained in drums, tank cars or

tanks. The procedures may also be used for sampling plastics dispersions.

Read sample 

Preview this standard in our Online Browsing Platform (OBP)
